info.description: This describes the dockstore API, a webservice that manages pairs of Docker images and associated metadata such as CWL documents and Dockerfiles used to build those images
info.title: Dockstore API

tags.name: extendedGA4GH
tags.description: Optional experimental extensions of the GA4GH API

post.summary: Annotate test JSON with information on whether it ran successfully on particular platforms plus metadata
post.description: Test JSON can be annotated with whether they ran correctly keyed by platform and associated with some metadata

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the underlying descriptor. Allowable values include "CWL", "WDL", "NFL".

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique identifier of the tool, scoped to this registry, for example `123456`

parameters.name: version_id
parameters.description: An identifier of the tool version for this particular tool registry, for example `v1`

parameters.name: relative_path
parameters.description: A relative path to the test json as retrieved from the files endpoint or the tests endpoint

parameters.name: verified
parameters.description: Verification status, omit to delete key

parameters.name: metadata
parameters.description: Additional information on the verification (notes, explanation)

404.description: The tool test cannot be found to annotate.
